Objects

Functions for generating objects to add to scenes

Sphere Object

Cube Object

Rectangular YZ Plane Object

Generate Cornell Box

Generate Ground

Generate Studio

Disk Object

`mesh3d` model

Materials

Functions to specify the visual properties of objects

diffuse()

Diffuse Material

Metallic Material

Microfacet Material

Glossy Material

Hair Material

Lambertian Material (deprecated)

Composing Scenes

Function for adding objects together to form a scene.

add_object()

Add Object

group_objects()

Group Objects

Animating Scenes

Function for animating objects or the camera through a scene.

get_saved_keyframes()

Get Saved Keyframes

generate_camera_motion()

Generate Camera Movement

animate_objects()

Animate Objects

Render Raytraced Scene

Function to render the current scene.

render_animation()

Render Animation

render_ao()

Render Ambient Occlusion

render_preview()

Render Preview

render_scene()

Render Scene
